titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Land and Water Conservation Fund for 10 years, and for other purposes.
A bill to reauthorize the Land and Water Conservation Fund for 10 years, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
This bill extends the authorization of appropriations for the Land and Water Conservation Fund (LWCF) through FY2025.
Appropriations deposited into the LWCF shall be allocated in the ratio of 60% and 40% for state and federal purposes, respectively.
